name: Missile Disarm
description:
Disarm the missiles that threaten the city. 

Connect the red wires of the artifact. You only have 20 seconds!!!

Built with DragonRuby for the 20 Second Game Jam.

 Controls:

  • LMB  -  Select/Unselect a tile 
  • RMB - Rotate a tile

Team:

  • Víctor: Code , UI.
  • Celia:  Assets    - Instagram

Credits:

Sounds : interface-sfx-pack-1 by obsydianx
